data.text: @rgloveroz @abcnews Sorry to hear about the sort of criticism and nastiness that you and colleagues cop. Love your show by the way so keep up the good work.
@rgloveroz @abcnews I just hope that even though sometimes these cowardly jerks hit a raw nerve with their hateful vitriol, you & all at our ABC are much respected & loved by most of us out here 😉
@rgloveroz @IamRebekahLowe @abcnews @ali__clarke you’re an absolute cracker don’t listen to #keyboardwarriors
@rhermens52 @abcnews Yes. Do I need to prove to you the brain scans etc. please back off just a little.
@rgloveroz @abcnews Yes - good on you, Ali. And I suspect you are intelligent & beautiful every day - crying or otherwise. Never ugly. Hold your head high.
